text: Countries by grape production in 2016 This is a list of countries by grape production in 2016 and 2017, based on data from the Food and Agriculture Organization Corporate Statistical Database. Countries - Select All; Regions - World + (Total); Elements - Production Quantity; Items - Grapes; Years - 2017 + 2016 The estimated total world production for grapes in 2017 was 74,276,583 metric tonnes, down 1.0% from 74,992,047 tonnes in 2016.Sum of values for countries with available data, which may be official or FAO data based on imputation methodology China was the largest producer of grapes, accounting for 16.8% of global production. Italy came second at 10.9%, followed by the United States at 9.6%. == Production by country == === >1,000,000 tonnes === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#ececec" ! Rank !!
